sentences.sContent: Perhaps as soon as 2007, these assistants will hover over an astronaut's shoulder, serving as an all-in-one PDA, videophone, and air monitor.
sentences.sContent_eng: Perhaps as soon as 2007, these assistants will hover over an astronaut's shoulder, serving as an all-in-one PDA, videophone, and air monitor.
sentences.sCn: 最快到2007年，这类助理型机器人就会出现在宇航员的箭头，它能用做PDA、可视电话并监测空气。

trans.tranOther: a type of telephone that allows you to see the person you are talking to on a screen
